filmography.title: Ladies of Leisure
filmography.role_description: A weary party girl who poses for a wealthy painter, leading to a romance that is threatened by his disapproving family.
filmography.plot: A model tries to escape her past and find redemption through love, but class differences threaten to tear the couple apart.

filmography.title: Night Nurse
filmography.role_description: A tough, dedicated nurse who uncovers a sinister plot by a chauffeur to starve two wealthy children to death.
filmography.plot: A nurse discovers a plot to murder two children for their trust fund and must race against time to save them.

filmography.title: The Miracle Woman
filmography.role_description: A preacher's daughter who, embittered by her father's treatment, becomes a cynical, staged faith healer.
filmography.plot: A disillusioned woman teams up with a con man to perform fake miracles, but her conscience begins to weigh on her.

filmography.title: Forbidden
filmography.role_description: A lonely librarian who falls for a married politician and sacrifices her own happiness to protect his career and their child.
filmography.plot: A woman has a long-term affair with a rising politician, keeping their child a secret to avoid a scandal.

filmography.title: The Bitter Tea of General Yen
filmography.role_description: An American missionary in Shanghai who becomes the captive and intellectual obsession of a Chinese warlord.
filmography.plot: During the Chinese Civil War, a missionary is rescued by a warlord and finds her values challenged by his philosophy.

filmography.title: Baby Face
filmography.role_description: A ruthless woman who sleeps her way up the corporate ladder of a New York bank, using men as stepping stones.
filmography.plot: A young woman uses her beauty and sexuality to advance her social and financial status, destroying men along the way.

filmography.title: Annie Oakley
filmography.role_description: The legendary sharpshooter who rises from backwoods obscurity to become the star of Buffalo Bill's Wild West Show.
filmography.plot: A fictionalized biography of the famous markswoman and her romance with fellow sharpshooter Toby Walker.

filmography.title: Stella Dallas
filmography.role_description: A vulgar but loving mother who sacrifices her own happiness and relationship with her daughter to give the girl a better future.
filmography.plot: A working-class woman marries a wealthy man but cannot fit into his society, eventually giving up her daughter to ensure her social standing.

filmography.title: The Mad Miss Manton
filmography.role_description: A high-society debutante and prankster who leads her bridge club in solving a murder mystery.
filmography.plot: A socialite finds a body, but it disappears before the police arrive, forcing her and her friends to find the killer themselves.

filmography.title: Golden Boy
filmography.role_description: A tough but tender woman torn between a boxing promoter and a young violinist-turned-prizefighter.
filmography.plot: A talented violinist chooses a career in boxing to make money, but the brutality of the sport threatens his soul and his hands.

filmography.title: Union Pacific
filmography.role_description: A spirited postmistress who becomes caught in a love triangle amidst the chaotic construction of the transcontinental railroad.
filmography.plot: The construction of the Union Pacific Railroad is threatened by sabotage and corruption, with a love story unfolding along the tracks.
filmography.awards: Cannes Film Festival: Win – Palme d'Or (1939/2002)

filmography.title: Remember the Night
filmography.role_description: A shoplifter who is taken home for Christmas by the prosecuting attorney, leading to a heartwarming romance and redemption.
filmography.plot: A prosecutor takes a shoplifter home to his family for the holidays after her trial is postponed, and they fall in love.

filmography.title: The Lady Eve
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated con artist who falls for her mark, a naive snake expert, and later returns as a British aristocrat to torment him.
filmography.plot: A trio of classy card sharks targets a socially awkward heir on an ocean liner, but the plan is complicated when the female lead falls in love.

filmography.title: Meet John Doe
filmography.role_description: An ambitious reporter who fabricates a letter from a suicidal 'John Doe' to save her job, sparking a national political movement.
filmography.plot: A reporter invents a fake story about a suicide protest, and a homeless man is hired to play the part, becoming a national hero.

filmography.title: Ball of Fire
filmography.role_description: A slang-talking nightclub singer who hides out from the police with a group of encyclopedists, teaching them about modern life.
filmography.plot: A group of professors working on a new encyclopedia encounter a mouthy nightclub singer who is wanted by the police to testify against her mobster boyfriend.

filmography.title: Double Indemnity
filmography.role_description: The definitive femme fatale who seduces an insurance salesman into murdering her husband to collect on an accident policy.
filmography.plot: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of his claims adjuster.

filmography.title: Christmas in Connecticut
filmography.role_description: A food writer who lies about being a skilled farm housewife and must maintain the charade when a war hero comes to visit.
filmography.plot: A food writer who has lied about being the perfect housewife must try to cover her deception when her boss and a returning war hero invite themselves to her home for a traditional family Christmas.

filmography.title: My Reputation
filmography.role_description: A young widow who faces town gossip and her mother's disapproval when she begins dating a soldier too soon after her husband's death.
filmography.plot: A widow refuses to mourn her husband according to the strict conventions of her social set and finds romance with an army major.

filmography.title: The Strange Love of Martha Ivers
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, domineering woman bound to her husband by a dark secret from their childhood involving a murder.
filmography.plot: A man returns to his hometown and uncovers the dark secrets of a wealthy couple who were his childhood friends.

filmography.title: The Two Mrs. Carrolls
filmography.role_description: A trusting wife who slowly realizes that her artist husband may be poisoning her, just as he did his first wife.
filmography.plot: A woman discovers that her husband, an artist, murdered his first wife and is now slowly poisoning her.

filmography.title: Sorry, Wrong Number
filmography.role_description: A neurotic, bedridden woman who overhears a murder plot on the telephone and slowly realizes she is the intended victim.
filmography.plot: While on the telephone, an invalid woman overhears what she thinks is a murder plot and attempts to prevent it.

filmography.title: The File on Thelma Jordon
filmography.role_description: A mysterious woman who seduces a district attorney into helping her cover up her aunt's murder.
filmography.plot: A woman accused of murder begins a romance with the assistant D.A. prosecuting her case, manipulating him to secure her acquittal.

filmography.title: No Man of Her Own
filmography.role_description: A pregnant, unmarried woman who assumes the identity of a dead woman after a train crash to give her child a better life.
filmography.plot: A pregnant woman assumes the identity of a fellow passenger killed in a train wreck, only to be blackmailed by her ex-boyfriend.

filmography.title: The Furies
filmography.role_description: A fiery rancher's daughter who engages in a bitter power struggle with her tyrannical father over control of their land.
filmography.plot: A strong-willed daughter clashes with her cattle baron father over his new marriage and the fate of their ranch.

filmography.title: Clash by Night
filmography.role_description: A weary woman who returns to her fishing village home and enters a loveless marriage for security, leading to an affair.
filmography.plot: A woman returns home and marries a good-natured fisherman but falls for his cynical friend, leading to domestic conflict.

filmography.title: Titanic
filmography.role_description: An unhappy wife attempting to take her children to America to escape her husband's upper-class European lifestyle before disaster strikes.
filmography.plot: An unhappily married couple struggle with their problems while on board the ill-fated ship.

filmography.title: All I Desire
filmography.role_description: A vaudeville actress who returns to the family she abandoned years earlier, seeking reconciliation and redemption.
filmography.plot: A mother who left her family to pursue a career in theater returns home to see her daughter in a high school play.

filmography.title: Executive Suite
filmography.role_description: The grief-stricken daughter of a company founder who holds a crucial block of stock and is manipulated in a boardroom power struggle.
filmography.plot: When a powerful CEO dies suddenly, a boardroom power struggle erupts to determine his successor.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress (Nina Foch)

filmography.title: There's Always Tomorrow
filmography.role_description: A successful fashion designer who reconnects with a former lover, now a bored family man, and tempts him with a new life.
filmography.plot: A neglected husband reconnects with a former employee, leading to an emotional affair that threatens his family life.

filmography.title: Forty Guns
filmography.role_description: A powerful landowner in Arizona who rules her territory with an iron fist and forty hired guns until a US Marshal arrives.
filmography.plot: A U.S. Marshal arrives in Arizona to arrest a killer, leading to a conflict with the powerful female landowner who employs him.
